Class Pizza

  • java.lang.Object
    • Pizza

  • public class Pizza
extends java.lang.Object
    A representation of pizza in a pizza order. Each pizza has a size of small, medium, or large. There are a number of toppings that include cheese, pepperoni, and veggie.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Pizza()
      Default constructor creates an object of a medium cheese pizza
      Pizza(Pizza pizzaToCopy)
      Copy Constructor creates a duplicate object for the given pizza
      Pizza(java.lang.String m_size, int m_cheese, int m_pepperoni, int m_veggie)
      Overloaded Constructor accepts values for size, cheese, pepperoni, and veggies

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double calcCost()
      Caclulates the the cost of the pizza based off the size and the number of toppings.

      Two pizzas are equal if they share the same size, number of cheese, number of pepperoni, and number of veggie toppings

        Overloaded Constructor accepts values for size, cheese, pepperoni, and veggies

        m_size - the size of the pizza
        m_cheese - the number of cheese toppings on the pizza
        m_pepperoni - the number of pepperoni toppings on the pizza
        m_veggie - the number of veggie topppings on the pizza

      • calcCost

        public double calcCost()
        Caclulates the the cost of the pizza based off the size and the number of toppings. 10$ for small, 12$ for medium, 14$ for large, and 2$ for each topping.
        Returns:
        the cost of the pizza in type double

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        the String representation of the pizza

      • equals

        public boolean equals(java.lang.Object o)
        Two pizzas are equal if they share the same size, number of cheese, number of pepperoni, and number of veggie toppings
        Overrides:
        equals in class java.lang.Object
        Parameters:
        o - the object that is compared to the pizza
        Returns:
        true if the object is equal and false if it isn't
